#importing necessary packages

```{python}

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.feature_extraction.text import TfidfVectorizer
from sklearn.naive_bayes import MultinomialNB
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score , classification_report
from sklearn.svm import LinearSVC
from tqdm import tqdm

```


#reading dataset

```{python}
data = pd.read_csv('C:/Users/Saran Babu/Downloads/spam.csv', encoding='latin-1')

```


#preprocessing dataset

```{python}

data.drop_duplicates(inplace=True)
data = data.reset_index(drop=True)  # Reset index to start from 0

#data['label'] = data['v1'].map({'ham':'ham', 'spam':'spam'})

x = data['v2']
y = data['v1']

```




#training the model

```{python}

x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(x,y,test_size=0.2, random_state=42)

tf_idf = TfidfVectorizer()
x_train_tfidf = tf_idf.fit_transform(x_train)
x_test_tfidf = tf_idf.transform(x_test)



model = LinearSVC()
_ = model.fit(x_train_tfidf, y_train)
y_pred = model.predict(x_test_tfidf)

accuracy = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
report = classification_report(y_test, y_pred, target_names=['Legitimate SMS', 'Spam SMS'])

print("Accuracy of model : ",accuracy)
print(report)
```
